docs: Initialize the contract with 6 horses and reward multipliers
constructors.label: new

docs: Place an exacta bet (predict 1st and 2nd place in order)
messages.label: place_exacta_bet

docs: Get all bets for current race
messages.label: get_bets

docs: Get total pot for current race
messages.label: get_total_pot

docs: Start the race with a given seed for deterministic simulation
messages.label: start_race

docs: Run the race simulation and determine winners
Uses probability-weighted selection based on the exacta formula:
P(j wins 2nd | i won 1st) = S[j] / (sum(S) - S[i])
messages.label: run_race_simulation

docs: Get all exacta probabilities and multipliers
messages.label: get_exacta_probability_table

docs: Get reward multiplier for an exacta combination
messages.label: get_reward_multiplier

docs: Get normalized strength for a horse
messages.label: get_normalized_strength

docs: Run a complete race simulation (for testing)
messages.label: simulate_complete_race
